Message: The cursed crystals corrode the land.

The source of this Curse is Ophelia,
who has transformed into
a Witch of Qlipha.

I am sure she must be in
so much pain...suffering all alone.

The only one with any chance
of stopping her is me...
No, I must stop her.

I take Oathkeeper,
my fingers gripping
tightly around its hilt.

...It was I who forced Ophelia
into making that promise...
Now I am to kill her?

...Ah, I see. In the end,
I’m no different from my brothers.

That is why...when I end her life,
I will just as soon end my own.

But, the crystals besieged the land,
impeding my journey with
one danger after another.

It was then and there
that I met the Duke.

He possessed a staff capable of
weakening the power of the Curse...
If I could borrow this power,
then perhaps...!

Wait for me just
a little longer, Ophelia...
I will come for you. I swear.
